1.name: Nosferatu
1.description: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.

2.name: Dr. Mabuse the Gambler
2.description: Arch-criminal Dr. Mabuse sets out to make a fortune and run Berlin. Detective Wenk sets out to stop him.

3.name: Robin Hood
3.description: A nobleman becomes the vigilante Robin Hood who protects the oppressed English people from the tyrannical Prince John.

4.name: Foolish Wives
4.description: A con artist masquerades a Russian nobility and attempts to seduce the wife of an American diplomat.

6.name: Grandma's Boy
6.description: A meek young man must find the courage within when a rogue tramp menaces his home town.

7.name: Oliver Twist
7.description: An orphan named Oliver Twist meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

8.name: Salomé
8.description: Salome, the daughter of Herodias, seduces her step-father/uncle Herod, governor of Judea, with a salacious dance. In return, he promises her the head of the prophet John the Baptist.

9.name: Sodom und Gomorrha
9.description: When the old multimillionaire Jackson Harber wants to marry the young model Mary, she hesitates, but her mother convinces her that this is her chance to lead a life in luxury and leisure. ...                See full summary »

10.name: When Knighthood Was in Flower
10.description: Mary Tudor, sister of England's Henry VIII, causes a stir by falling in love with a guardsman below her class.

11.name: The Loves of Pharaoh
11.description: The Ethiopian King offers his daughter to a powerful Pharaoh to secure peace between the two countries.

12.name: Luffar-Petter
12.description: Peter joins the army after fleeing from the repercussions of a love affair. Greta is one of the daughters of a mayor from the army. Her father is the major, at whose town Peter's army ...                See full summary »

14.name: Sherlock Holmes
14.description: A young Sherlock Holmes seeks to bring down the criminal mastermind Moriarty as he solves a crime involving a blackmailed prince.

15.name: Blood and Sand
15.description: A toreador's familial and social life is threatened when he has an affair.

16.name: Monte Cristo

17.name: Beyond the Rocks
17.description: A young woman marries an older millionaire and then falls in love with a handsome nobleman on her honeymoon.

18.name: The Toll of the Sea
18.description: While visiting China, an American man falls in love with a young Chinese woman, but he then has second thoughts about the relationship.

19.name: Phantom
19.description: A shiftless young man becomes obsessed with a mysterious woman and yearns to find her again.

20.name: Fox Farm
20.description: A gypsy loves a married farmer who is blinded blowing up a tree.

21.name: The Young Rajah
21.description: A young man raised in the American South discovers he is an Indian prince whose throne was taken by usurpers.

23.name: The Prisoner of Zenda
23.description: When the king is drugged and abducted by his ambitious brother, a lookalike relative must take his place to keep the evil sibling off the throne.

24.name: Flames of Passion
24.description: A KC's wife is forced to admit in court that the child killed by her drunken ex-chauffeur was hers.

25.name: Penrod
25.description: Young rapscallion Penrod Schofield causes a good deal of trouble in his community, all in the name of protecting kids from too-strict parents and nasty neighbors. He heads the ABPA (...                See full summary »

26.name: Dr. Jack
26.description: Country Doctor, Jack Jackson is called in to treat the Sick-Little-Well-Girl, who has been making Dr. Saulsbourg and is sanitarium very rich, after years of unsuccessful treatment. His ...                See full summary »

27.name: Shadows
27.description: A dying Chinese man converts to Christianity in order to stop a friend from being blackmailed.

29.name: The Bride's Play
29.description: An Irish lass is torn between the poet who seduced her and noble man who truly loves.

30.name: Manslaughter
30.description: Society-girl thrill seeker Lydia causes the death of motorcycle policeman and is prosecuted by her fiancé Daniel who describes in lurid detail the downfall of Rome. While she's in prison she reforms and Daniel becomes a wasted alcoholic.

32.name: Tess of the Storm Country

33.name: Vem dömer
33.description: The young girl Ursula is forced to marry an older man that she hates.

34.name: Lucrezia Borgia
34.description: Rodrigo Borgia, Pope Alexander VI, has three adult children: Juan, who is virtuous and has a sweetheart who is a woman of the people, Lucrezia, who is virtuous and wants to marry Alfonso, ...                See full summary »

37.name: The Man from Beyond
37.description: A man who has been frozen in the Arctic ice for 100 years returns to civilization to find his lost love.

38.name: Anderssonskans Kalle
38.description: Anderssonskans Kalle is the horror of the neighborhood due to his mischief.

39.name: The Burning Soil
39.description: When farmer Rog dies, his son Peter stays, but Johannes can not be satisfied with such a condition (and servant Maria's love) and finds a job as old Count Rudenberg's secretary. His ...                See full summary »

40.name: Fascination
40.description: A young woman with a Spanish father and an American mother living in Spain under the supervision of a strict aunt slips out to attend a bullfight. There she becomes fascinated by the toreador Carrita.

41.description: Gloria, the daughter in a wealthy family, has finally spent most of her father's money. She marries Tony, whose as much of a reckless spendthrift as she is, and they continue indulging ...                See full summary »

42.name: Moran of the Lady Letty
42.description: A milquetoast young man of society toughens up once he's shanghaied and falls for the captain's tomboy daughter.

43.name: One Exciting Night
43.description: A young orphan girl, courted by an unpleasant older wealthy man who has a hold over her adoptive mother, falls in love with a young stranger at a party. Odd noises begin to be heard as a ...                See full summary »

45.name: The Trap
45.description: A miner's happiness is destroyed when a rival steals his mine. He becomes obsessed with revenge, and plans a trap for the man who took his mine.

50.name: Watch Your Step
